config.definition:
An identifier of the used setup
         configuration, e.g. if variations of the same setup are
         used.

config_id.definition: The ID of a setup configuration stored e.g. in a database.

creator.definition: The person who built the setup.

definition:
The experimental setup used in the recordings. By
      using HardwareProperties as a subsection, a very detailed
      description of the setup can be given.

department.definition:
The department where the setup is
         located.

location.definition: The location of the setup (e.g. room).

maintainer.definition:
The person who is responsible for the setup
          maintanance.
